definition: to teach as substitute for absent teacher
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: The village leader, Mr. Tian, asks Wei Minzhi to take Mr. Gao's place until he comes back.
sentences.chinese: 田村长让魏敏芝替高老师代课，直到他回来。

sentences.english: Some say he had his son teach the class.
sentences.chinese: 有人说他叫他儿子代课。

sentences.english: In some states you can even become a substitute teacher even if you only have a limited amount of credits.
sentences.chinese: 在一些国家即使你没有高学历，也可以成为代课老师。

sentences.english: The teacher, who usually takes high school students, could not be reached for comment.
sentences.chinese: 记者访问不到这名曾是高中教师的代课老师。

sentences.english: During the absence of Jean, Mary functioned as relief teacher.
sentences.chinese: 简不在的时候，玛丽起了代课老师的作用。

sentences.english: Don't wring your hands like a substitute teacher in the wildest home room.
sentences.chinese: 不要像在年级教室里的代课老帅一样使劲挥动双手。

sentences.english: Students in every grade consider a sub fair game.
sentences.chinese: 每个年级的学生都认为代课老师是公平的。

sentences.english: Thanks to Mrs. Lu for her substituting in many classes.
sentences.chinese: 我们也感谢吕女士过去多次为学校代课。

sentences.english: When the teacher was sick, there was no substitute teacher.
sentences.chinese: 如果老师生病了，也没有代课老师。

sentences.english: Sixth grade to a new substitute teachers.
sentences.chinese: 六年级来了一名新代课教师。

sentences.english: I'll be your substitute for the next few days.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的几天中我将会是你们的代课老师。

sentences.english: One student at Shenzhen University who identified himself as Qi works as a double.
sentences.chinese: 深圳大学的学生小齐就是一名代课替身。

sentences.english: Substitute teachers fill in when your regular teacher is sick.
sentences.chinese: 你平日的老师生病时，就会有代理的代课老师。

sentences.english: I wish we had no subsitutes.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我们没有代课老师。

sentences.english: For some, he is the substitute teacher of their dreams.
sentences.chinese: 对一些人来说，他是梦寐以求的代课老师。

sentences.english: When a substitute teacher is present, all class rules still apply.
sentences.chinese: 有代课老师来，班级的规定一样要遵守。

definition: to give classes/to work as a teacher
to teach classes in addition to other duties/to hold several teaching jobs
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
to take extra lessons in a cram school or with a private tutor
to make up missed lesson/to reschedule a class
teacher in charge of a class
to join the faculty of one's alma mater upon graduation/to remain at school during vacation
to replace sb on a workshift/to substitute for
